lockr

Overview

lockr is a simple and user-friendly R package designed for encrypting and decrypting files.

Installation

You can install lockr using the remotes package:

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("danielvartan/lockr")

Usage

lockr usage is very straightforward. The main functions are:

  • lock_file: Encrypt a file.
  • unlock_file: Decrypt a locked file.

Along with these, there are helper functions to facilitate key management and other tasks. Click here to see the full list of lockr functions.
